William, the Survivalist SRE
0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 5 Max Stamina = 13 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has four or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first, second, and third turns, satiate William, the Survivalist’s hunger by 2.
Jimmy, the Comfort Eater SRE
0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 4 Max Stamina = 9 Hunger 3 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has four or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) At the beginning of your first, second, and third turns, satiate Jimmy, the Comfort Eater’s hunger by 4. Whenever Jimmy, the Comfort Eater is fed, remove a hunger counter from him and put an endurance counter on him.
Satiation Potion SRE
4 4 Item - Food Item
1 Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Satiation Potion: Remove all hunger counters from target permanent. Satisfy its hunger by 5.
Healing Potion SRE
3 3 Item - Food Item
1 Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Healing Potion: If target permanent has less endurance counters on it than its starting endurance, put endurance counters on it equal to the difference.
Rat Swarm SRE
2 2 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove 1 endurance counter from each Food you don’t control. You may remove 1 additional endurance counter from each Food in play.
Hurricane SRE
2 2 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove 3 endurance counters from each Structure you don’t control.
Earthquake SRE
3 3 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove 6 endurance counters from each Structure in play.
Questionably Science SRE
2 2 Action Action
1 Draw two cards.
Pseudoscientific Advancement SRE
3 3 Action Action
1 Research twice.
Rat Horde SRE
4 4 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove 2 endurance counters from each Food you don’t control. You may remove 2 additional endurance counters from each Food in play.
Thief in the Night SRE
3 3 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove all endurance counters from target item.
Hungry Thief in the Night SRE
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove all endurance counters from target Food item.
Burly Thief in the Night SRE
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove all endurance counters from target Material item.
Worker SRE
1 1 Ally Ally
1 Stamina Regen = 1 Hunger 1 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has four or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)
Food SRE
0 Token Item - Food Item
1 Food enters tapped. Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Food: Satiate target permanent’s hunger by 1.
Restoration SRE
1 1 Action Action
1 Remove all hunger counters from target ally or survivor. Then if that permanent has less endurance counters than its starting endurance, put endurance counters on it equal to the difference.

1 Stamina Regen = 1

2 2 Ally Ally

Tower of Knowledge SRE
8 8 Structure Structure
1 At the beginning of your main phase, research.
Tower of Wealth SRE

1 At the beginning of your main phase, draw a card.
Wildfire SRE
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove 2 endurance counters from each Structure you don’t control.
Plague SRE
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Remove 1 endurance counter from each Food in play and each Ally in play.
Sabotage SRE
3 3 Action Action
1 Reactive Put target card on the stack into its owner’s discard pile.
Reanimation Ritual SRE
6 6 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Put target ally card in your graveyard onto the field under your control.
Distort SRE
3 3 Action Action
1 Reactive Put target card in an event queue into its owner’s discard pile.
Ruin SRE
1 1 Event Event
1 On Trigger: Each opponent removes an endurance counter from two permanents they control.
Watchtower SRE
2 2 Structure Structure
1 If an endurance counter would be removed from an ally you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Watchtower instead.
Wall SRE
1 1 Structure Structure
1 If an endurance counter would be removed from a permanent you control, you may remove that endurance counter from Wall instead.
Storehouse SRE
2 2 Structure Structure
1 If an endurance counter would be removed from a Food you control, if it wasn’t part of a cost, you may remove that endurance counter from Storehouse instead.
Farm Plot SRE
2 2 Structure - Farm Structure
1 Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Farm Plot: Create a Food token. A deck can have any number of cards named Farm Plot.
Wheat Field SRE
3 3 Structure - Farm Structure
1 Tap, Remove an endurance counter from Wheat Field: Create a Food token.
